stimulusHtml:
© Breamore House, Hampshire, UK/Bridgeman Images

The work shown can be attributed to
choicesHtml: Johannes Vermeer, because of the depiction of a softly lit domestic scene
Diego Velázquez, because of the subject choice of a family portrait
William Hogarth, because of the satirical content combined with a genre scene
Juan Rodríguez Juárez, because of the subject choice of a casta painting
